citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:32pm on
01-Feb-17.
Veterinary Medical Officer arrived at the facility on Wednesday, February 1, 2017 at 2:32pm. VMO rang the doorbell
twice and knocked on the door. VMO called the phone number provided by the licensee and left a voice message at
2:35pm. VMO waited at the facility for thirty minutes before leaving the premises.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:32pm on
01-Feb-17.
Veterinary Medical Officer arrived at the facility on Wednesday, February 1, 2017 at 2:32pm. VMO rang the doorbell
twice and knocked on the door. VMO called the phone number provided by the licensee and left a voice message at
2:35pm. VMO waited at the facility for thirty minutes before leaving the premises.
